t: Who can create a Brand Store?

s: Did you know that brands enrolled in Amazon Brand Registry have three account roles available to them? Once you’ve enrolled your brand in Brand Registry, you’re assigned the roles of Rights Owner and Administrator. You can then affiliate users and assign roles to help manage your brand.
